title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems this is in red text.
OB: The issue is related to the Copy Project dialog UI. When attempting to copy a project named 'test' with the 'use default location' option checked, I can't select or view the default location in the edit box below.
EB: I expect that when 'use default location' is checked, I should still have the option to select or view the default location from the edit box below. Additionally, I should be able to choose a different path close to the default location if needed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a single project named 'test'.
2. Copy the project.
3. On the 'Copy Project' dialog:
   a. Check the 'use default location' option and ensure it's selected.
   b. Attempt to select or view the default location from the edit box below.
   c. Try to choose a path close to the default location if desired.
